'''''Amon Hen'' 226''' is the two-hundred-and-twenty-sixth issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in [[November]] [[2010]].

==Contents==
* Cover: ''[[:Image:AmonHen226.jpg|Bombadil]]''
** By: [[Jef Murray]]
* Editorial
** By: [[Andrew Butler]]
* Contents
* Announcements
* [[Rath Dínen]]: [[Glen GoodKnight]]
* Obituary: Zainab Thorp
** By: Monty Thorp
* AGM Announcements
* [[International Tolkien Fellowship|International]] Upcoming Events
** By: Susan Frances Edwards
* [[Hall of Fire]]
** By: Lynn Forest-Hill
* Request for information on [[Cor Blok]] paintings
** By: [[Pieter Collier]]
* Advert: ''[[Parma Eldalamberon 14]]'' reissue
* ''[[The Return of the Ring|Return of the Ring]]'' announcement
* Advert: [[Beyond Bree]] 30th Anniversary Calendar
* R.G. Collingwood - Another Tolkien Reference
** By: [[Charles Noad]]
* Regarding the Nature of... [[Gandalf]]
** By: David Doerr
* Artwork: ''[[Lonely Mountain|...The Lonely Mountain]]''
** By: Colin Williams
* Behind Glass Doors
** By: Madeline Flint
* Artwork: ''[[Arwen]]'' (at her wedding feast)
** By: Jef Murray
* Approaching the [[Harlond (Lindon)|Harlond]]
** By: Liz Stephen
* Poem: ''The Forging of the "Needful"''
** By: Julie Sinclair
* Review: [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]] and the Albert Hall
** By: Guy Powell
* Report: Discworld Convention 2010
** By: Jessica Yates
* Review: ''Two Worlds'' CDs
** By: Michael Cunningham
* Letters
* Artwork: ''Evenstar''
** By: Lynn Whitaker
* News from [[Fangorn Forest|Fangorn]]
** By: Carol Brownlow
* Meet the Committee

* Around the World in 80(?) Societies

* Artwork: ''Treebeard''
** By: Sue Wookey
* Jessica's Corner
** By: Jessica Yates
* New Members
* Member Profile

* Dates for your Diary/Committee
